    • 构造器详细资料

      • TournamentStimulater

        public TournamentStimulater(GameState gs,
                            java.util.List<Player> players,
                            int turn,
                            boolean flag1,
                            boolean flag2)
        Constructor of the TournamentStimulater class with coming parameters
        参数:
        gs - the game state with GameState type
        players - the list of players in the game
        turn - the current turn with int type
        flag1 - if the game start with a UI
        flag2 - if the gamestate needs to be initilized

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute()
        This method is mainly to display the details of the game on the console
        返回:
        "draw" String after the turns
